content_writer.notes: Agent returned valid JSON wrapped in markdown code fences. Underlying structure is correct with status/result/metadata. Rich data with headlines array, blog_content string, social_posts array of objects, email_content object.

seo_analyst.notes: Clean pass. Returned well-structured JSON with all keyword arrays, meta descriptions, optimization checklist, and strategy fields.

graphics_generator.notes: IMAGE OUTPUT agent. Returns plain text describing 4 generated visual assets rather than standard JSON format. Parsed into structured assets array with name, intended_use, and specifications fields.

marketing_coordinator.notes: MANAGER agent. Returned valid JSON structure with control characters causing parse issues. Underlying format is standard status/result/metadata with aggregated sub-agent outputs. All data fields are strings containing consolidated campaign deliverables.
